attributes.action: SAFE OUR `NHS` BY CUTTING ITS COSTS AS FOLLOWS.
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDESIGNED WANT THE HEALTH SERVICE TO CHANGE THE SYSTEM AND SAVE MONEY AS SOME THINGS DO NOT ADD UP WITH THE SYSTEM, FIRST LIKE US WHEN WE TRAVEL ABROAD WE ARE REQUIRED TO TAKE OUT `INSURANCE` AND SO MUST ALL PEOPLE THAT COME INTO THIS COUNTRY INSTEAD OF GETTING `FREE TREATMENT` WHICH TAKES THE FUNDS AWAY FROM THE UK PEOPLE AND PEOPLE MOANING ABOUT THE LACK OF FUNDS, MAKES SENSE AS A NUMBER OF PEOPLE FROM ABROAD `ABUSE` OUR NHS SYSTEM AT OUR COST, ALSO IT MAKES SENSE FOR OUR PEOPLE WHO PLAY WITH DANGER IN VARIOUS SPORTS TO TAKE OUT INSURANCE INSTEAD OF THE `NHS` PICKING THE BILLS UP WHEN THINGS GO WRONG, NOBODY FROM OUTSIDE THE `UK` SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO HAVE THINGS `FREE` ON ANY BENEFITS WHEN OUR `POOR PEOPLE` SUFFER, NO FAMILIES WOULD BE EXSPECT TO FUND OTHERS WHEN THEY ARE HAVING TROUBLE COPPING, NOR SHOULD THE GOVERMENT.

MAKES SENSE WITH THE PUBLIC PURSE.
